Package oop.quizzler.model

Interface RemoteInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Server
public interface RemoteInterface extends Remote
This interface is used to define the methods that are available to the client.

  • Method Summary

    Method

  • Method Details

    • addQuiz

      boolean addQuiz(Quiz quiz) throws RemoteException
      adds a quiz to the server
      Parameters:
      quiz - quiz to be added
      Returns:
      returns true if the quiz was added successfully
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote object is not available

    • deleteQuiz

      boolean deleteQuiz(String name) throws RemoteException
      deletes a quiz from the server
      Parameters:
      name - name of the quiz to be deleted
      Returns:
      returns true if the quiz was deleted successfully
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote object is not available

    • getQuiz

      Quiz getQuiz(String name) throws RemoteException
      gets a quiz from the server
      Parameters:
      name - name of the quiz to be returned
      Returns:
      returns the quiz with the given name
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote object is not available

    • getQuizzesString

      String[] getQuizzesString() throws RemoteException
      gets all quiznames from the server
      Returns:
      returns all quiznames from the server in a String array
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote object is not available

    • addHighscore

      void addHighscore(Attempt attempt, String name) throws RemoteException
      adds a highscore to the quiz on the server
      Parameters:
      attempt - attempt with score to be added
      name - name of the quiz to add the highscore to
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote object is not available
